application.title: SiLA Client
application.meta_description: SiLA Client - SiLA Standard Client Simple, Smart, Open Source

components.name: home_jumbotron
components.title: SiLA Client
components.text:
SiLA Client - Simple, Smart, Open source

What can you do?

  • Add SiLA devices to your virtual lab
  • Share and discover SiLA devices in your network
  • Connect multiple SiLA devices (or SiLA drivers for non-SiLA devices)
  • Run Methods and call SiLA Commands on any device in your virtual lab


Contribute? Source code is here.

What can you do?

  • Add SiLA devices to your virtual lab
  • Share and discover SiLA devices in your network
  • Connect multiple SiLA devices (or SiLA drivers for non-SiLA devices)
  • Run Methods and call SiLA Commands on any device in your virtual lab


Contribute? Source code is here.

options.transform: function(doc) { var device = Devices.findOne({_id: doc.deviceId }); if(device) doc.deviceName = device.name; return doc; }
function(doc) { var device = Devices.findOne({_id: doc.deviceId }); if(device) doc.deviceName = device.name; return doc; }
function(doc) { var command = CommonCommandSet.findOne({_id: doc.commandId }); if(command) doc.commandName = command.name; return doc; }
